languages.text: {n}Винтерскейл бесстрашно ухмыляется.{/n} "Быть может, однажды мы это проверим. Давненько {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g} не устраивали войн в Просторе Коронус".
{n}Undaunted, Winterscale chuckles.{/n} "Perhaps we will see for ourselves one day. It has been a long time since {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} last waged war in the Koronus Expanse."
languages.original_text: {n}Винтерскейл бесстрашно ухмыляется.{/n} "Быть может, однажды мы это проверим. Давненько {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g} не устраивали войн в Просторе Коронус".

traits.locale_text: {n}Undaunted, Winterscale chuckles.{/n} "Perhaps we will see for ourselves one day. It has been a long time since {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} last waged war in the Koronus Expanse."
{n}Undaunted, Winterscale chuckles.{/n} "Perhaps we will see for ourselves one day. It has been a long time since {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} last waged war in the Koronus Expanse."
{n}Undaunted, Winterscale chuckles.{/n} "Perhaps we will see for ourselves one day. It has been a long time since {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} last waged war in the Koronus Expanse."
{n}Undaunted, Winterscale chuckles.{/n} "Perhaps we will see for ourselves one day. It has been a long time since {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} last waged war in the Koronus Expanse."

languages.text: {n}ウィンタースケールは懲りずにくすくす笑う。{/n}「きっと俺たちであれば、いつか自分の目で確かめるさ。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}がコロヌス・エクスパンスの戦いで最後に給金をもらってから、もうずいぶんと経つ」
languages.original_text: {n}Undaunted, Winterscale chuckles.{/n} "Perhaps we will see for ourselves one day. It has been a long time since {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} last waged war in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウィンタースケールは懲りずにくすくす笑う。{/n}「きっと俺たちであれば、いつか自分の目で確かめるさ。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}がコロヌス・エクスパンスの戦いで最後に給金をもらってから、もうずいぶんと経つ」

languages.text: {n}温特斯凯尔笑了起来，完全没把你的话放在眼里。{/n}“那不如我们等着瞧吧？科罗努斯扩区已经很久没爆发过{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}之间的战争了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Undaunted, Winterscale chuckles.{/n} "Perhaps we will see for ourselves one day. It has been a long time since {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} last waged war in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}温特斯凯尔笑了起来，完全没把你的话放在眼里。{/n}“那不如我们等着瞧吧？科罗努斯扩区已经很久没爆发过{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}之间的战争了。”

languages.text: {n}Winterscale ríe, despreocupado.{/n} «Tal vez lo descubramos algún día. Ha pasado mucho tiempo desde la última guerra entre {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g} en la Extensión de Koronus».
languages.original_text: {n}Undaunted, Winterscale chuckles.{/n} "Perhaps we will see for ourselves one day. It has been a long time since {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} last waged war in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale ríe, despreocupado.{/n} «Tal vez lo descubramos algún día. Ha pasado mucho tiempo desde la última guerra entre {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g} en la Extensión de Koronus».

languages.text: {n}Loin d'être déstabilisé, Winterscale s'esclaffe.{/n} « Nous aurons peut-être l'occasion de le découvrir un jour. Voilà bien longtemps que les Étendues de Koronus n'ont pas été le théâtre d'une guerre entre {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Undaunted, Winterscale chuckles.{/n} "Perhaps we will see for ourselves one day. It has been a long time since {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} last waged war in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Loin d'être déstabilisé, Winterscale s'esclaffe.{/n} « Nous aurons peut-être l'occasion de le découvrir un jour. Voilà bien longtemps que les Étendues de Koronus n'ont pas été le théâtre d'une guerre entre {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}. »

languages.text: {n}Winterzunder kichert unbeeindruckt.{/n} "Vielleicht werden wir das eines Tages herausfinden. Es ist lange her, seit {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} in der Koronus-Ausdehnung Krieg geführt haben."
languages.original_text: {n}Undaunted, Winterscale chuckles.{/n} "Perhaps we will see for ourselves one day. It has been a long time since {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} last waged war in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterzunder kichert unbeeindruckt.{/n} "Vielleicht werden wir das eines Tages herausfinden. Es ist lange her, seit {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} in der Koronus-Ausdehnung Krieg geführt haben."

languages.text: {n}Gözü pek Winterscale kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Zamanı gelirse onu da görürüz. Koronus Enginliği'nde epeydir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} savaşı yaşanmadı."
languages.original_text: {n}Undaunted, Winterscale chuckles.{/n} "Perhaps we will see for ourselves one day. It has been a long time since {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g} last waged war in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözü pek Winterscale kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Zamanı gelirse onu da görürüz. Koronus Genişliği'nde {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} savaşı yaşanalı uzun zaman geçti."
